wikipedia_page.main: Linda Buckley-Archer is a London-based writer. She was born in Sussex, but spent most of her childhood on a blackcurrant farm in Staffordshire, and now lives in London.

response: The Gideon Trilogy is a 2006 science fiction book series by Linda Buckley-Archer. This series has also been called The Enlightenment of Peter Schock.
* Linda Buckley-Archer – Gideon the Cutpurse – Simon & Schuster

link_mentions.page: List of works with different titles in the United Kingdom and United States
